# Victor Jimenez - Full Stack Developer & AI Specialist

> Personal portfolio and professional profile of Victor Juan Jimenez Flores, a Full Stack Developer and AI Specialist based in Peru.

## About

Victor Jimenez is a Computer and Systems Engineer with a PhD in Administration. He specializes in:
- Full Stack Development (Python, Node.js, Vue.js, React)
- AI Agent Development (Chatbots, Virtual Assistants, RAG Architectures)
- WhatsApp and Instagram Messenger bots
- MEVN Stack (MongoDB, Express, Vue.js, Node.js)

## Contact

- Email: vj.jimenez96@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/ViktorJJF
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/victorjuanjimenez
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ViktorJimenezF

## Services

Victor offers 1:1 mentoring sessions on:
- Web Development
- Artificial Intelligence
- Software Architecture
- Professional Career Development

## Education

- PhD in Administration - César Vallejo University (2024)
- MBA - Neumann Business School (2021)
- Computer and Systems Engineer - Universidad Nacional Jorge Basadre Grohmann (2018)
